descriptionHtml:
*Introduction*
Hi Guys, this is My first \"Mod\" (Well, it\'s not really a mod, just a save game...) on the Nexus. Enjoy this (IMO) cool Character. He\'s modeled after my Brother, that Jason Statham the Actor closely resembles, :S.

*Description*
This Saved Game contains a Male Nord Character at Level One, Who\'s still in the Helgen Keep, or optionally, has JUST arrived at Riverwood. His Name is Grey Wolf, and He\'s fully mold-able into any character you can envisage, although admittedly, He\'s suited to be more of a Fighter then a Mage or Sneak, not for any skill reasons, but just due to his appearance.

*Requirements*
In order to get the fully shaved head, the Mod \"Full Bald Hair\" is a required. Just search it here on the Nexus, it\'s an extremely small Down Load.

*Misc*
I\'m personally an avid RPer, and this is my main Character. I would provide a back-story and some RP tips/ideas for this Char, but I personally think it\'s better if You, the people can make one up for yourself.

If You want to modify the Char, use the showracemenu Console Command.

*Installation*
Download the file(s) and unzip them  into Your Skyrim Saves folder. The file-path is
MyComputer/MyDocuments//MyGames/Skyrim/Saves

*Author*
As previously mentioned, this is My first Mod on the Nexus, and I\'m also trying to get some help with a Mod Idea on the Forums, called Skyrim Animation Enhanced Role-Playing. http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/473074-saer-skyrim-animation-enhanced-role-playing/page__p__3880037__fromsearch__1#entry3880037
author: xGreyWolfx
